name: Slaporkiss
description:
You can never tell when is the right time to kiss her...
it's a short game that you need to answer right with a single goal, to kiss her...

I made this game for  "2 Buttons game jam" 2019, a jam where you need to create a game that can be played with 2 buttons only.
First time i'm making a "dating-sim", I usually don't play this sort of games but it was fun creating this game. 
It took me 1 day in total.

https://itch.io/jam/2-buttons-jam-2019

Buttons ¯\_(ツ)_/¯                                                                                                               ;  -> Y - yes N - no
